metadata.title: Alessandro Amella | Freelance Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Freelance full-stack developer based in Modena, Italy. Building web applications, backends and APIs mainly with the MERN stack. AI/LLM integrations, cloud and automation.
metadata.keywords: full stack developer, freelance Node.js developer, MERN stack, NestJS, backend developer, AI LLM, web developer Italy

homepage.description:
Freelance full-stack developer, from Modena .

I help startups and companies design and develop web applications, mobile apps and software, from architecture definition to production deployment.

I work mainly in the JavaScript ecosystem (MERN stack), but also handle AI and LLM integrations, cloud infrastructure, process automation and data management. More about me and my projects below!

otherInterestsList.radio: Radio: diploma in telecommunications and <ham>radio amateur</ham>

homepage.someProjectsDescription: These are just some of the projects I have worked on, many more are on GitHub.
homepage.contactSubtitle: For quotes, consultations or information, you can contact me through the following form (or via the channels at the bottom right).
homepage.otherChannels: You can also find me on
homepage.webDevelopmentDescription: Development of websites, web applications and custom software.
homepage.consultingDescription: Consulting on IT problems, choice of technologies and solutions.

footer.emailBody: Hello! I would like to ask you for some information about...

contact.sendError: Error sending message :( Please try again later.

infolog.description:
• System administrator at Infolog S.r.l., where I worked with the development team to create a web application for warehouse management.
  • Refactored the Microsoft SQL Server database.

seta.description:
• Internship at the public transport company SETA S.p.A., where I developed the software for generating audio files for announcements on buses, currently used across the entire fleet in Modena, Reggio Emilia and Piacenza.
  • Training of a machine learning model for passenger counting using onboard cameras.

fertec.description:
• Design and development of a microservice system for an oxygenator production plant, from the general architecture to Raspberry Pi devices on Arch Linux.
  • Development of cost analysis software and a Flutter app to interface with medical devices.

freelance.description: Working with startups on various web projects. Mostly MERN stack (or often PostgreSQL and NestJS). I've worked on microservices architectures with automated CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure deployment, and plenty of AI / LLM service integration.

iotdashboard.title: IoT Dashboard
iotdashboard.description: Industrial IoT platform for device monitoring. Integrated with Eclipse Kapua and TimescaleDB (time-series), reducing historical query times by 90% via SQL continuous aggregates.

ianus.title: IA-nus
ianus.description: Complete double-entry accounting engine for Italian VAT holders: invoicing, VAT, payment schedules, cash flow, depreciation. Entirely driven through an LLM chat with function calling, structured output, and RAG.

sciopero.title: C'Ã¨ Sciopero?
sciopero.description: Bachelor's thesis and empirical case study: scraper and aggregator of Italian strike notices with an LLM-based pipeline. 1,400+ benchmarks across multiple models (GPT, Gemini, Llama, DeepSeek) and preprocessing strategies (reaching an F1-Score >0.95). The end product is a mobile app with real-time alerts for Italian public transport strikes.

bamboosim.title: BambooSIM
bamboosim.description: An online eSIM card store with a custom CMS for managing products, orders and customers. Integration with multiple payment gateways and cloud deployment.

ezaffitto.title: ezaffitto
ezaffitto.description: Fully automated rental ad collector from various websites with AI (OpenAI) parsing structured as microservices.

vhfesuperiori.title: VHF e superiori
vhfesuperiori.description: An event manager and social network for radio amateurs curated by volunteers. A place to share your creations, connections (QSO) and meet new people.

occupalostudente.title: Occupa lo Studente
occupalostudente.description: A web application for job searching that connects companies and students of the I.T.I.S. E. Fermi di Modena. Institutional login via Google OAuth 2.0.

visitedCountries.title: Countries I've visited
visitedCountries.description: I am at {x} countries visited... For now...
